description: This is a shell script used to manage the start and stop of the 'mcastproxy' service, which sets up multicast proxy configurations using 'igmpproxy' or 'smcrouted' depending on the system. It handles network interface configurations, service initialization, and responding to system events related to network status.

methods.name: do_start_igmpproxy
methods.description: Sets up configuration files and launches the multicast proxy daemon based on network status and system configuration.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes network interface variables and system properties before starting the service.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the multicast proxy service if WAN interface is available and enabled.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the multicast proxy service and cleans up configuration files.
